txt.en:
'A merry festival to you! 

'They say that the festival is a time for cheer and for doing good deeds towards others. Would you be willing to assist me in this endeavour?

'Over by the inn, outside the training hall, you will find Constable Underhill. He was kind to me when I first moved to Combe, and as repayment, I have baked him some delicious pastries. Would you take them to him?'
'Good day to you.\n\n'Oh! Something smells delicious! Working always makes me so hungry....'
'Head south-east from here and go up the stone stairs. You should find Constable Underhill standing outside of the training hall.'
Gail Catchpole would like you to bring her delicious pastries to Constable Underhill.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Deliver the pastries to Constable Underhill in Combe
Constable Underhill is outside the training hall in Combe.\n\nGail Catchpole would like you to bring her delicious pastries to Constable Underhill.
Deliver the pastries to Constable Underhill in Combe
